ayurveda.title: What is Ayurveda?
ayurveda.metaDescription: Discover the principles and benefits of Ayurveda, the ancient holistic healing system from India that focuses on balancing mind, body, and spirit.
ayurveda.subtitle: The ancient science of life and holistic healing that originated in India over 5,000 years ago
ayurveda.introPara1: Ayurveda, which translates to 'knowledge of life,' is one of the world's oldest holistic healing systems. Developed in India thousands of years ago, it's based on the belief that health and wellness depend on a delicate balance between the mind, body, and spirit.
ayurveda.introPara2: Unlike modern medicine that often treats symptoms, Ayurveda focuses on promoting good health rather than fighting disease. It emphasizes prevention and addresses the root causes of imbalances through diet, lifestyle, herbal remedies, and therapeutic procedures.
ayurveda.introPara3: The primary goal of Ayurveda is to help people live long, healthy, and balanced lives without the need for pills, complicated treatments, or surgery. It achieves this by harmonizing the body's constitution or 'dosha' and creating a lifestyle that's suitable for one's unique nature.
ayurveda.doshasSubtitle: According to Ayurvedic principles, we all have a unique combination of three energies or life forces called doshas

doshas.name: Vata
doshas.description: Vata governs movement and is responsible for basic body processes such as breathing, cell division, and circulation. When in balance, Vata promotes creativity and flexibility.
doshas.qualities: Dry, light, cold, rough, subtle, mobile

doshas.name: Pitta
doshas.description: Pitta controls metabolism, digestion, and energy production. Balanced Pitta leads to contentment and intelligence while promoting understanding and a sharp mind.
doshas.qualities: Hot, sharp, light, oily, liquid, mobile

doshas.name: Kapha
doshas.description: Kapha is responsible for growth, structure, and lubrication in the body. When in balance, Kapha expresses love, calmness, and forgiveness.
doshas.qualities: Heavy, slow, cool, oily, smooth, dense, soft, stable

ayurveda.benefitsSubtitle: Discover how Ayurveda can improve your overall well-being

benefits.title: Stress Reduction
benefits.description: Ayurvedic practices like meditation, yoga, and specific breathing exercises help reduce stress and promote mental clarity and relaxation.

benefits.title: Detoxification
benefits.description: Panchakarma and other Ayurvedic detox therapies help remove toxins from the body, improving overall health and immunity.

benefits.title: Improved Digestion
benefits.description: Many Ayurvedic treatments focus on enhancing digestive fire (Agni), which helps improve nutrient absorption and prevent digestive disorders.

benefits.title: Weight Management
benefits.description: By balancing doshas and improving metabolism, Ayurveda offers natural approaches to maintaining a healthy weight.

benefits.title: Better Sleep
benefits.description: Ayurvedic routines and herbal remedies can help regulate sleep cycles and address issues like insomnia for deeper, more restful sleep.

benefits.title: Enhanced Immunity
benefits.description: Ayurvedic herbs and lifestyle practices strengthen the immune system, helping the body prevent and fight off illness naturally.
